item.title: Hello World
item.description: About two years ago I started learning R. I felt like I had reached the end of what I could accomplish with data ans analysis using Excel and other tools, and was surrounded by lots of opportunities to support faculty members as R was advancing in various fields. I took several courses and “got it,” but was definitely in a confused, liminal state on my way to really understanding it. I stopped taking classes and turned my attention to multidisciplinary “explorations.
